title: Science Quiz
description: Consists of 15 questions exploring the wonders of the natural world and scientific phenomena.

questions.question: What is the chemical symbol for water?
What planet is known as the Red Planet?
What is the speed of light?
What is the hardest natural substance on Earth?
What is the most abundant gas in Earth's atmosphere?
What planet is closest to the sun?
What is the powerhouse of the cell?
What is the boiling point of water at sea level?
What is the largest planet in our solar system?
What gas do plants absorb from the atmosphere?

title: Geography Quiz
description: Consists of 14 questions testing your knowledge of world geography, countries, and capitals.

questions.question: What is the capital of France?

Which country has the most population?
What is the smallest country in the world?

Which ocean is the largest?
What is the capital city of Japan?
Which country is known as the Land of the Rising Sun?
Which mountain is the highest in the world?
